episode_event_ch0279_00_kakeru/4001_1001:
Uh-huh... So you compete for the best time in a
Pokémon battle?
I wanna do it too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
episode_event_ch0279_00_kakeru/4001_0401:
Oh, but aren’t teams of three the norm here on
Pasio?
episode_event_ch0279_00_kakeru/4001_0402:
Oh yeah—a team on Pasio usually has three
people!
episode_event_ch0279_00_kakeru/4001_1001: I wonder if there’s anyone who’d join us...
Hey! Elaine!
We’re here!
Chase?!
Heya, Elaine, Eevee!

There’s a lot of people here... Is something
going on?
And you are...?

This is [Name:PlayerNickname ]. We’re about
to take on the Pokémon battle time trial together...
A time trial?! Wow! Sounds cool!
We wanna join too! Can we? Can we pleeease?

Not before you introduce yourself to
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Or should I do it?
This is Chase!

And as you just saw, he loves running his mouth
as much as, well...running!

Oh, he’s also from the same place as me—Pallet
Town!
Nice to meet you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
episode_event_ch0279_00_kakeru/4001_0401: Hehe! If it’s speed you need, look no further!
episode_event_ch0279_00_kakeru/4001_0402:
Yup! When it comes to a foot race, I won’t lose
to anyone!
episode_event_ch0279_00_kakeru/4001_1001:
Chase’s Pikachu is a little unusual, kinda like my
Eevee.

Yeah! It doesn’t like to go back in its ball, and it
can use Secret Techniques!
We’re awful good at Pokémon battles, too!

Seriously, just ask Elaine—we helped her out
plenty of times back in Kanto!
*grumble*
I was the one that helped YOU out, remember?
All right! Let’s go and practice as a team!
Let’s start by racing to the square over there!
Ready, set...go!
Hey! Wait up, Chase!
episode_event_ch0279_00_kakeru/6001_1001:
When it comes to speed, I’m second to none!
Whether it’s racing or battling, we won’t lose!
episode_event_ch0279_00_kakeru/4002_1001: I think we got a pretty good time...
OK! The team in first place is...

You really had us on our toes—our teams made
nearly the same time!

Nice work. But don’t go thinking you’re in for an
easy win next time.

We’ve still got a ways to go before we catch up
to them...

One day...one day we’ll be a better pair than
Red and Pikachu!

Let’s stay the path together until we’re the
strongest we can be!
Whoa! I just can’t stand still right now!
Let's race to the sunset! Ready, set...go!
